=========================================
Welcome to helloMyName
=========================================

|docs| |pypi|

Purpose
-------

Toy hello world package.

Documentation for myNameHello
-----------------------------

.. |docs| image:: docs/_static/docs.gif

Platform
--------

helloMyName is compatible with linux 64 bit operating systems.

Python Distribution
-------------------

helloMyName is written in python 2. Most functionality should be forwards compatible.

Install
-------

From the terminal:

.. code-block::

    (venv)$ pip install helloMyName
